Key Match Events: Lawrence Chaziya fouled Ltaief Sayfallah in the box, resulting in a penalty for Tunisia in the 87th minute
Post-Match Reflections: Patrick Mabedi said there were several positives that could be drawn from the match
John Banda was disappointed with the loss
Others: The Flames were hoping for back-to-back victory in the World Cup qualifiers after beating Liberia 1-0 on Friday
The result means the Flames are still third in Group H with three points from two matches
The match was played at Bingu National Stadium
